text: Sophora davidii eflora Sophora davidii is a deciduous shrub from south-west China. It can grow up to 3 metres tall. It has blue and white pea flowers and is also known a David mountain laurel. It has been gathered in Texas. == References == == Other websites == *Two New Members of the Callerya Group (Fabaceae) *New Aspects in Floral Development of Papilionoideae *S. viciifolia Hance var. chuansiensis C.Y.Ma Category:Faboideae Category:Shrubs
title: Sophora davidii
